Txt_Talk_NajimiTower_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text: *: C-Customers! After all this time! I can't tell you how happy I am to see you!

Txt_Talk_NajimiTower_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_021.Text: *: You see that lady by the top of the stairs? She looked young enough to me, but she acts for all the world like she's as old as me gran.
*: That lady by the stairs never seems to sleep, y'know... Night after night she just potters around up there. You'd fink she'd be knackered, but she's anyfink but!
*: Remember that lady who used to 'ang around the top o' stairs? She's bleedin' scarpered. Must admit, though, I feel a little better now she's gone.

Txt_Talk_NajimiTower_Penthouse_MAIN_0_AC.Text: *: (snore snore) Mmm-nm-nm...
*: Well, well, well! So you've come at last...
*: Well, well, well! So you've come at last... But what's this? Your leader is in a blessed coffin!
*: I've dreamt so many times of giving you this key. Heaven alone knows why...
*: But it must mean something, so...here you go. One thief's key. You'll take it, won't you?
*: I've dreamt so many times of giving your leader this key. Heaven alone knows why...
*: But it must mean something, so...here you go. One thief's key. You'll take it for them, won't you?
*: Oh. Right. It seems this is one dream that isn't destined to come true... The exception which proves the rule, eh?
{MOST_HEROIC} acquires <DefSgl_I_NAME>!
*: Now, use that to go and have a look inside the house in Reeve with a red door.
*: Don't worry: the chap there loves visitors! He won't mind you dropping in unannounced one jot.
*: Off you go then. I can't stand around all day<--->I've got important dreams to be having!
*: By the way, there are books in this world so influential that they can change your whole personality.
*: Open them with caution, that's my advice.
*: Hmm... Mmm-nm-nm... Zzz...
*: Well, if it isn't {MOST_HEROIC}! Very good to see you, young friend! So, is that key proving useful to you?
*: Ho ho! But of course it is! My dreams are never wrong, you know!
*: Hmm, that's strange... I made sure everything happened just as it did in my dream...
*: (snore snore) Mmm-nm-nm...
*: By the way, there are books in this world so influential that they can change your whole personality.
*: Open them with caution, that's my advice.
*: Hmm... Mmm-nm-nm... Zzz...

Txt_Talk_NajimiTower_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: What I wouldn't give for a nice rest in this cosy little inn here...
...and a monster is revealed before your eyes!
Seems I'm in for more toil and trouble...
{LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
*: Oh, how me old bones ache, dearie.
